resources.string: In simple mode only basic functionality will be available from the main screen. Result is rounded up to 5 digits, degrees are used as the default angle units.
In engineer mode special functions will be used on the main screen. Result is not rounded and is presented in engineer notation, radians are used as the default angle units.
Excellent! Tap the button one more time to try again
Tap the button below once to use 9
Swipe from the center of the button up to use %
Swipe from the center of the button down to use ^2
The app is set up and ready to use.
Calculator in separate window allows you to do calculations while using other apps on your device
Swipe button is an exclusive feature of Calculator++ which provides fast access to the secondary functions
Do you really want to finish wizard?
